security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill containing only markdown files with prompt engineering guidelines. No executable code, no file system access beyond its own directory, no network calls, and no sensitive data access.

content.user_title: Master Prompt Engineering for AI Agents
content.value_statement: Poor prompts waste tokens and produce inconsistent results. This skill provides proven standards for writing clear, efficient prompts that maximize AI performance and follow Anthropic best practices.
actual_capabilities: Create well-structured prompts using markdown sections
Optimize existing prompts for token efficiency
Apply context engineering principles to reduce noise
Use just-in-time information loading in prompts
Write direct, actionable instructions instead of vague suggestions
Design effective examples and constraints for AI agents
limitations: Provides guidelines only - does not execute or test prompts
Does not integrate with external tools or APIs
Requires manual application of principles to your prompts
Does not generate prompts automatically from specifications

use_cases.title: Design Effective Agent Context
use_cases.description: Create clear system prompts and context documentation that guide AI agents to behave consistently and reliably.

use_cases.title: Write Better Claude Prompts
use_cases.description: Improve prompts for Claude, Codex, or Claude Code with proven techniques that reduce token usage while maintaining clarity.

use_cases.title: Structure Documentation for AI
use_cases.description: Format technical documentation so AI agents can understand and use it efficiently with minimal context loading.

prompt_templates.title: Create Basic Prompt
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a prompt using this structure: ## Background Information [essential context] ## Instructions [direct action items] ## Examples [1-2 concrete cases] ## Constraints [boundaries].

prompt_templates.title: Optimize Existing Prompt
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this prompt for verbosity: [paste prompt]. Identify: redundant phrases, vague language, missing structure, and excessive detail. Provide an optimized version.

prompt_templates.title: Add Context Structure
prompt_templates.prompt: Structure this content into markdown sections: [paste content]. Use Background Information, Instructions, Examples, and Constraints. Remove redundant details.

prompt_templates.title: Apply Context Engineering
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply context engineering principles to this prompt: [paste prompt]. Replace full data with references, convert suggestions to imperatives, and use lists over paragraphs.

output_examples.input: Optimize this prompt: You should always make sure to validate the user's input before you process it because invalid input could cause problems. When you encounter errors, you should return them in JSON format so that the calling system can parse them properly.

best_practices: Use imperative voice: "Do X" instead of "You should do X"
Prefer bulleted lists over paragraphs for requirements
Load detailed information just-in-time using references
anti_patterns: Including historical context that is not essential
Loading all data upfront instead of using references

faq.question: Which AI tools support these prompt techniques?
faq.answer: These principles work with any LLM including Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. The techniques focus on clear communication.

faq.question: How long does it take to see results?
faq.answer: Applying these principles immediately improves prompt clarity. Token reduction benefits appear on first use.

faq.question: Do I need to install anything?
faq.answer: No. This skill contains documentation only. Read the standards and apply them to your own prompts manually.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads its own documentation files. No data is sent anywhere or stored externally.

faq.question: Why are my AI responses inconsistent?
faq.answer: Inconsistent results often stem from vague instructions. Apply direct language and clear constraints from these standards.

faq.question: How is this different from other prompt guides?
faq.answer: These standards are based on Anthropic's engineering practices specifically for AI agent contexts and context management.
